Package controller

Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
controller.MenuController
public class MenuController
extends java.lang.Object
This class controller all the MenuView of the game.
Version:
1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javafx.scene.control.Button buttonInit
    This is a FXML Button of the menuview that initiates the game.
    private Game game
    game is the singleton, the game is only created once.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label labelIPServer
    This is a FXML label of the menuview that shows the IP of the server.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label labelPortServer
    This is a FXML label of the menuview that shows the port of the server.
    private javafx.scene.control.TextField textFieldIp
    This is a FXML TextField of the menuview that is the input of the IP in the client.
    private javafx.scene.control.TextField textFieldName
    This is a FXML TextField of the menuview that is the input of the playe's name.
    private javafx.scene.control.TextField textFieldPuerto
    This is a FXML TextField of the menuview that is the input of the port number.
    private javafx.scene.layout.VBox vBoxCreate
    This is a FXML VBox of the menuview that shows when the player select to create a game.
    private javafx.scene.layout.VBox vBoxJoin
    This is a FXML VBox of the menuview that shows when the player select to join a game.
    private javafx.scene.layout.VBox vBoxSelect
    This is a FXML VBox of the menuview that contains the firt view of the menu.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MenuController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void handleCreateServer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    When the player select to create a game, this method will create the server and wait for a client.
    private void handleInitGame​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    When the client press the init button, this method will create the first connection and verifies if the game exist.
    private void handleJoinServer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    When the player select to join a game, this method will connect to the server.
    private void initialize()
    This method is called by the FXMLLoader when initialization is complete
    private void openGameView()
    This methos opens the gameView.fxml
    private void updateGUIMessage()
    This method is a thread tha waits for the connection of the client.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • handleCreateServer

      private void handleCreateServer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the player select to create a game, this method will create the server and wait for a client.
      Parameters:
      event - type ActionEvent

    • handleJoinServer

      private void handleJoinServer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the player select to join a game, this method will connect to the server.
      Parameters:
      event - The event button for to joinGame

    • handleInitGame

      private void handleInitGame​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the client press the init button, this method will create the first connection and verifies if the game exist.
      Parameters:
      event - type ActionEvent

    • updateGUIMessage

      private void updateGUIMessage()
      This method is a thread tha waits for the connection of the client. It compares the old information with the new one.

    • openGameView

      private void openGameView()
      This methos opens the gameView.fxml
